parties: Tests have shown that SST restoring in the Atlantic may lead to an undesirable response of the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC) and hence of SSTs in other regions (including the south Atlantic) which can obscure results.

name: Minimise AMOC change
rationale: DCPP, minimise AMOC change, restore salinity
longName: Minimise changes to Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation
